description:
Side flats 166-172
G1 Cherry, Ash      Self-sown saplings, fell and poison
T2 Mature Oak     Reduce back to previous pruning points 3 M approx and shape, remove deadwood
G3 Beech, Oak     Reduce back to previous pruning points approx 3 M, shape  and remove deadwood
G4 Mixed Cherry Cut overhang to clear lawned area

Side front 139-141
G2 2 Silver Birch    Reduce by 3 M approx and shape
T6 Poplar                Tree situated on railway side, reduce overhanging branches to clear roof
Block 137-115
G7 2 Cherry Trees  Reduce in size and shape by 3 M, lift to clear block 103-113
Block 103-113
H8 Hedge                          Cut to the height of barbed wire to clear
G9 4 Ornamental Pear    Reduce in size by 2-3 M approx, cut back to clear building and shape
G10 2 Cherry, 1 Laurel    Reduce by 3 M, cut back to clear building by 2 M
T11 Sorbus                        Dead tree, fell
T12 Poplar                         Re-pollard
T13 Acer                             Reduce by 3M and shape, close to building
T14 Ash                              Cut back to clear building 3 Meters
T15 Sorbus                        Dead, fell and grind out stumps
decision_conditions: Side front 139-141
G2 2 Silver Birch    Reduce by 3 M approx and shape
T6 Poplar                Tree situated on railway side, reduce overhanging branches to clear roof
Block 137-115
G7 2 Cherry Trees  Reduce in size and shape by 3 M, lift to clear block 103-113
Block 103-113
H8 Hedge                          Cut to the height of barbed wire to clear
G9 4 Ornamental Pear    Reduce in size by 2-3 M approx, cut back to clear building and shape
G10 2 Cherry, 1 Laurel    Reduce by 3 M, cut back to clear building by 2 M
T11 Sorbus                        Dead tree, fell
T12 Poplar                         Re-pollard
T13 Acer                             Reduce by 3M and shape, close to building
The trees and works above are not listed on the Havering TPO 2/89 and therefore there is no need to gain permission to carry out these works.
It is recommended that the following trees identified on the submitted plan and identified on the Havering TPO2/89 identified as area A3 can be pruned as below.
G1 Cherry, Ash      Self-sown saplings, fell and poison
T2 Mature Oak     Reduce back to previous pruning points 3 M approx and shape, remove deadwood
G3 Beech, Oak     Reduce back to previous pruning points approx 3 M, shape  and remove deadwood
G4 Mixed Cherry Cut overhang to clear lawned area
T14 Ash                              Cut back to clear building 3 Meters
T15 Sorbus                        Dead, fell and grind out stumps
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out to the standards detailed in British Standard Document BS 3998:2010.
Reason:
To ensure that the work is carried out in accordance with good arboricultural practice.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out within 2 years from the date of this consent.
Reason:
To prevent the accumulation of consents.

Having considered the particular circumstances of the case and the position of the trees for which consent to fell has been granted the Council has decided that it will not be necessary to replace the trees.
